A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly disappointed in the storey\, Rian Johnson was given what I would say the best possible movie in the franchise\, he could have given the characters to the Star Wars saga the well deserved recognition\, and legendary send off we all wanted to see\, WTF?\nButchered\, it was so out of tune with the actual Star Wars theme\, it makes the phantom menace a success\,..\nMark Hamil should have been able to have a say in the storey writing as I believe he understands the closure that the fans wanted for the legends of Star Wars.
